
[coverage]

[coverage:python_version < "3.6"]
coverage==5.5
pytest-cov==2.12.1

[coverage:python_version >= "3.6"]
pytest-cov==4.0.0

[coverage:python_version >= "3.6" and python_version < "3.7"]
coverage==6.2

[coverage:python_version >= "3.7"]
coverage==6.5.0

[flake8]

[flake8:python_version < "3.6"]
flake8==3.7.9
mccabe==0.6.1
pyflakes==2.1.1
pycodestyle==2.5.0

[flake8:python_version >= "3.6"]
flake8==5.0.4
mccabe==0.7.0
pyflakes==2.5.0
pycodestyle==2.9.1
